name: Casinopia: The Blackjack
description:
Casinopia: The Blackjack is the first of the series of Casinopia that offers you a casual blackjack game in virtual reality world and available on HTC Vive. Sit on a casino table, immerse yourself in beautiful leisure places and enjoy the game! Casinopia: The Blackjack is a Free-to-Play VR social casino game with high quality graphic which maximizes the social feature through VR HMD's Motion Controller and Voice Chatting, providing an immersive interaction between users and a realistic casino gaming experience that could not be found on other existing PC or mobile casino games. Play against a beautiful, attractive dealer in single-mode or join other players in multiplayer-mode. The game also offers in-app purchases which helps you win and boost your rank to the top. Keep playing and practice your Blackjack strategy to reach the top of the world rankings!Features:
  • Take yourself to beautiful immersive leisure places.
    Choose your favorite place and play the game! Go to the beach to play Blackjack or enjoy the view and walk around the beach for your relaxation. Or simply choose a bar where you can enjoy your game quietly. Beautiful, attractive dealers will accompany you all the time!
  • Play or watch!
    Join the game as a player or be a spectator to watch games of other players. Learn other players' strategy and improve yours!
  • Interaction through Voice Chat
    Be connected with other players. Chat and interact with others using Voice Chat system.
  • Multiplayer support
    The more the merrier! Play with up to 5 players in a game.
  • Ranking system
    Check the real time rankings around the world and set yourself on the top of the world rankings!
